Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As the flames surrounded Void all they did was burn off his cloak, revealing 
the being that looks more like some blood red demon, its scales glistening 
with bits of metal and organic matter. Void laughs as two red and green wings 
sprout from his back. In an instant the wings fold infront of him and then 
seemigly split and reform themselves into a new cloak. Quickly void lunges at 
and grabs the robot as a cloud of corrosive acid and gas encompasses the 
robot and the area around it that eats away at his armor and super structure.

--part1_b0.214b6cf1.298c8479_boundary
